mapper.select: select * from vpn.user where name=#{name} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.update: update vpn.user set score=score+#{score} where name=#{name}
update vpn.user set level=#{level} where name=#{name} and level < 3
update vpn.user set level=0 where level=3 and paidStartTime >= #{start} and paidEndime <= #{end}
update vpn.user set email=#{email} where name=#{name}
update vpn.user set score=score-150 where score >= 150
update vpn.user set level=0 where score < 2100 and level < 3
update vpn.user set level=1 where score >= 2100 and score < 4100 and level < 3
update vpn.user set level=2 where score >= 4100 and level < 3
